mapper.update: {CALL sp_io_process( #{ioNo, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date, mode=IN, jdbcType=DATE}, #{type, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handlerCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialCode, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{resultCode, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{message, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )}
